subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.description: Buy subscription in Telegram bot @Petr_Piglet_VPN_bot. You get 3 QR-codes for connection. Save them.

happ.title: Apps for connection
happ.description: Install Happ Proxy Utility which is available on Google Play and AppStore

connectionSteps.title: Connection
cards: Open Happ Proxy Utility and press "QR-code" button
Press "Gallery" and select QR-code for connection or point camera on it
Press "turn on/off" button and provide permission for adding VPN configuration
For turning off press "turn on/off" button once again
